tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  last_used TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  device_id INT,
  access_time TIMESTAMP,
  success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_codes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    recovery_code TEXT,
    used BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT UNIQUE,
    email TEXT UNIQUE,
    password_hash TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    device_name TEXT,
    last_used TIMESTAMP,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
